trans-unit.source: Provides services for XAML serialization by XAML designers or other callers that require advanced serialization.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i servizi per la serializzazione XAML da finestre di progettazione XAML o altri chiamanti che richiedono la serializzazione avanzata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager> attempts to optimize access to services that are called frequently during the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager> tenta di ottimizzare l'accesso ai servizi che vengono chiamati frequentemente durante il processo di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager> is also used as an input for certain specialized `ShouldSerialize` methods on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] classes such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.ShouldSerializeInlines%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and for an overload of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter.Save%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager> viene inoltre utilizzato come un input specializzati per determinate `ShouldSerialize` metodi su [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] classi, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.ShouldSerializeInlines%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>e per un overload di <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter.Save%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The XML writer implementation to use as basis for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Implementazione del writer XML da utilizzare come base per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XAML writer mode.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la modalità del writer XAML.

trans-unit.source: Not a valid member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriterMode" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Non è un membro valido dell'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriterMode" />.
